channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Throwing Conservatives a Bone Won’t Fix What’s Wrong with Harvard
item.description: Until the university decides to take on viewpoint diversity seriously, the faculty’s concerns about external pressure will continue to ring hollow.

item.title: Heritage Foundation founder Feulner dies at 83
item.description: Edwin J. Feulner Jr., founder of The Heritage Foundation and leader of the conservative movement, died Friday at age 83.

item.title: Trump says Epstein grand jury testimony won't satisfy 'radical left lunatics'

item.title: Texas attorney general sues adult swimming group for allowing transgender competitors
item.description: The Texas attorney general has sued an adult swimming program after two transgender women were allowed to compete at a meet this spring in San Antonio...

item.title: Trump administration imposes limits on Mexican flights and threatens Delta alliance in trade dispute

item.title: California’s High-Speed Rail to Nowhere
item.description: There was no reason for the feds to pour good money after bad supporting a preposterous project that doesn’t have any national significance.

item.title: A Long Overdue Victory on Public Broadcasting
item.description: President Trump and Republicans have finally followed through on something conservatives have dreamed about for decades.

item.title: President Trump’s Lawfare Against Senator Schiff
item.description: There’s probably no prosecutable federal case, since the statute of limitations has expired.

item.title: Boston’s Freedom Trail, Even in Sauna Weather, Rouses Heart and Soul
item.description: Bunker Hill, a sundered church, and Patriot graves convey the Revolution’s tumult, plus lessons in Puritan design.

item.title: Education Department will release some frozen grants supporting after-school and summer programs

item.title: The ‘Leather-Bound’ Epstein Book Reeks Of Being A Fake Plant To Implicate Trump
item.description: President Trump's claim that some of the Epstein files are 'made up' by Democrats and the FBI makes a lot more sense now.

item.title: Shane Gillis’ ESPY Monologue Proves Woke Is On The Run
item.description: A mass rejection of nonsense is exactly what society needs.

item.title: 10 Cringiest Moments Of Stephen Colbert’s Career As An Unfunny Democrat Mouthpiece
item.description: Here is a look back at 10 times Stephen Colbert used The Late Show to brainwash viewers and peddle leftist talking points.

item.title: 3 Biden Aides And Counting Plead The Fifth To Avoid Truth About Puppet Presidency
item.description: Republicans have called in several Biden White House aides to get to the bottom of what really went down. Except, no one is willing to talk.
